Name: process-specific burdens, municipal waste incineration | process-specific burdens, municipal waste incineration | EN15804GD, U
Category: E:Water supply; sewerage, waste management and remediation activities/38:Waste collection, treatment and disposal activities; materials recovery/382:Waste treatment and disposal/3821:Treatment and disposal of non-hazardous waste
Description: average Swiss municipal soild waste incineration plants in 2000 with grate incinerator, with electrostatic precipitator for fly ash (ESP), wet flue gas scrubber and 29.4%  SNCR , 32.2%  SCR-high dust , 24.6%  SCR-low dust -DeNOx facilities and 13.8% without Denox  (by burnt waste, according to Swiss average).
